Column1: bridge.admin.setTokenPair networkClass chainId tokenStandard tokenAddress bridgeable redeemable owned minAmount feePercentage redeemDelay metadata
Column2: Set a token pair to enable bridging the asset
Remove a token pair to disable bridging the asset
Revoke an unwrap request to prevent it from being redeemed.

Column1: bridge.admin.setNetwork networkClass chainId name contractAddress metadata
